name.baseName: 风轮机制造 ; 3.6 MW 的风轮机

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This data set represents the manufacturing process of a 3.6 MW wind turbine, specifically engineered for offshore wind farm applications such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF). These turbines are designed to withstand marine conditions and are suitable for large-scale deployment in offshore wind farms to provide sustainable and renewable energy.
该数据集代表了3.6MW风轮机的制造过程，专门用于例如东海大桥海上风电场(DBOWF)的海上风电场应用。这些风机设计用于承受海洋条件，并适用于海上风电场的大规模部署，以提供可持续的可再生能源。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the manufacturing process of a 3.6 MW wind turbine, specifically engineered for offshore wind farm applications such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF). These turbines are designed to withstand marine conditions and are suitable for large-scale deployment in offshore wind farms to provide sustainable and renewable energy.
该数据集代表了3.6MW风轮机的制造过程，专门用于例如东海大桥海上风电场(DBOWF)的海上风电场应用。这些风机设计用于承受海洋条件，并适用于海上风电场的大规模部署，以提供可持续的可再生能源。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.
风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should consider the comprehensive stages detailed in the PLCA modeling approach including material and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling for the Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of offshore wind farms. Ensure the inclusion of sea transportation energy and facility installation energy in the assessment. Adjust data for local conditions and specific project configurations as necessary. Pay attention to uncertainties detailed in the sensitivity analysis provided and factor these into your own LCA calculations.
该数据集的用户应考虑PLCA建模方法中详述的全面阶段，包括海上风电场的生命周期评估（LCA），包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护以及拆解和回收。确保在评估中包括海运能源和设施安装能源。必要时根据当地条件和特定项目配置调整数据。注意提供的敏感性分析中详述的不确定性，并将这些因素纳入您自己的LCA计算。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
